entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 6:16 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Periods of snow beginning in the morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. Forecast issued 6:16 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023
